articles.author: Stephen  Smith
articles.title: Chimpanzee escapes exhibit at Indianapolis zoo, prompting temporary lockdown - CBS News
articles.description: A chimpanzee escaped its enclosure and was on the loose at the Indianapolis Zoo, but the animal was later located and returned to her exhibit, the zoo said.
articles.content:
A chimpanzee escaped its enclosure and was on the loose at the Indianapolis Zoo Friday morning, but the animal was later located and returned to her exhibit, the zoo said.
